name: Vietnamese-Style Shrimp Soup
author: culinarychaos
summary: Quick and tastes like a authentic vietnamese soup :) Before throwing anything into the pot, make sure all your ingredients are prepped- this soup is really quick cooking!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
salt and black pepper to taste
1 (6.75 ounce) package long rice noodles (rice vermicelli)
directions: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat
Stir in the garlic and ginger; cook and stir 1 minute
Add the spinach and season with salt and pepper
Cover, and cook until the spinach is hot, about 3 minutes
Pour in the chicken stock, shrimp stock, hot pepper sauce, and hoisin sauce
Recover, and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat
Once the soup reaches a simmer, stir in the shrimp and noodles
Cover, and cook 4 minutes, then stir in the green onions, and cook 5 minutes more
Season to taste with salt and pepper before serving
